failure.label: Complications...
failure.value:
You find one of those answers the hard way.

You may only ask one question.
Anyone can answer, but the Overlord has the final say.

  • What is going on here? What do my senses tell me?
  • Is something hidden or out of place? If so, what looks suspicious?
  • Tell me about _____ . How could it hurt me? How could it help me?
  • Tell me about _____ . What are they doing? What will they do next
  • What will happen if I _____ ?
